instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-2915: What is 820-2915? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: In need of <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2915</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> board or <TRANSISTOR>Q7080</TRANSISTOR> to buy
threads.message:
I'm in need of an <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2915</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> for parts or specifically <TRANSISTOR>Q7080</TRANSISTOR> for a repair that I have pending. I have donor boards in my shop and I have some on order but none have this specific component.
Anyone have a faulty board or component that I can buy? PM me if so. Thanks.
